markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=747) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 231 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=745)

</column>

---

You can cast more arcane spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from wizard archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest wizard spell slots.
name: Arcane Breadth
